name: FiltererComposed
description: The `FiltererComposed` class is a powerful event filtering utility that allows you to combine multiple event filters using logical AND and OR operations. This enables complex filtering logic for JSMacros events, giving you fine-grained control over which events trigger your scripts.
overview:
FiltererComposed implements the `EventFilterer.Compound` interface and serves as a composite filter that can combine multiple individual filters. It uses a logical structure where:

- **AND operations**: All filters in a group must pass for the group to pass
- **OR operations**: Any group can pass for the entire filter to pass

This structure allows you to create sophisticated filtering conditions like "filter events where (condition A AND condition B) OR (condition C AND condition D)".

constructors.description: Creates a new composed filterer with an initial filter.

parameters.name: initial
parameters.description: The initial filter to start the composition with

methods.name: and
methods.description: Adds a filter using AND logic to the current OR group. All filters in the current group must pass for the group to be considered successful.

parameters.name: filterer
parameters.description: The filter to add with AND logic

methods.name: or
methods.description: Adds a filter using OR logic by starting a new group. Any group can pass for the entire filter to be successful.

parameters.name: filterer
parameters.description: The filter to add with OR logic (starts a new group)

methods.name: canFilter
methods.description: Determines whether this composed filter can filter the specified event type.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The name of the event type to check

methods.name: test
methods.description: Tests an event against the composed filter logic.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event object to test against the filter

methods.name: checkCyclicRef
methods.description: Internal method to check for cyclic references between compound filters. This is called automatically when adding filters and prevents infinite loops.

parameters.name: base
parameters.description: The base compound filter to check against
